SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ var b=function(){this.c=""};b.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeScript{"+this.c+"}"};b.prototype.a=function(a){this.c=a};(new b).a("");var c=function(){this.g=""};c.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyle{"+this.g+"}"};c.prototype.a=function(a){this.g=a};(new c).a("");var d=function(){this.f=""};d.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyleSheet{"+this.f+"}"};d.prototype.a=function(a){this.f=a};(new d).a("");var e=function(){this.b=""};e.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeHtml{"+this.b+"}"};e.prototype.a=function(a){this.b=a};(new e).a("");(new e).a("");(new e).a("
");}).call(this);

h3.div: The Governor has canceled school for the remainder of the academic year. The Milford Public Schools will continue our remote learning program through the last day of school on June 17th.

div.p: During the unprecedented and unparalleled events that have transpired with the current pandemic, the Milford Public School District is evolving to adapt teaching and learning to remote learning platforms. The administration and staff in each building are working in collaboration to provide a robust and comprehensive learning experience for students. Nothing can replace the in-person schooling experience. As teachers shift to remote learning, we recognize that this type of instruction is new to both teachers and families. We have developed Guiding Tenets, Goals, Expectations and Responsibilities that will drive remote learning plans across the district. Please review the following:

h3.div: Guiding Tenets ~ Goals ~ Expectations and Responsibilities
